About the Author

Trouble

By [Tia Louise

Spencer Carrollton]198-spencer is [a dark - haired , hazel - eyed bully]307-a dark - haired , hazel - eyed bully . When [I]0-i collided with [him]198-spencer at [[my]0-i cousin]308-my cousin ’s wedding , [I]0-i was n’t looking for love . But [his]198-spencer naughty eyes flashed , [his]198-spencer full lips curled into a knowing smile , and [I]0-i should have run . [I]0-i did n’t . [I]0-i kissed [him]198-spencer instead .

Then [he]198-spencer gave [me]0-i a job when [I]0-i needed it the most . [I]0-i never get involved with [clients]309-clients , but [Spencer Carrollton]198-spencer is wickedly handsome in a bespoke suit . [He]198-spencer ’s devastatingly sexy out of it . [He]198-spencer ’s possessive , demanding , and the best sex [I]0-i ’ve ever had .

[He]198-spencer ’s [an arrogant billionaire]310-an arrogant billionaire , who thinks [I]0-i ’ll fall at [his]198-spencer feet , but [I]0-i ’m not going down [that road]311-that road again . Then [he]198-spencer pulls [me]0-i out of danger and insists [I]0-i move in with [him]198-spencer until it ’s safe . As the nights pass and [we]312-we grow closer , [I]0-i know [I]0-i ’m losing this fight . [Spencer Carrollton]198-spencer always gets what [he]198-spencer wants . The trouble is , [he]198-spencer wants [me]0-i .

( TROUBLE is [a STAND - ALONE frenemies - to - lovers , billionaire - boss romance]313-a stand - alone frenemies - to - lovers , billionaire - boss romance . No cheating . No cliffhanger . )

This book is a work of fiction . Names , characters , places , and incidents are products of [the author]314-the author ’s imagination or are used fictitiously . Any resemblance to actual events or locales or [persons]315-persons , living or dead , is entirely coincidental .

Prologue

Spencer “ [I]330-my mom have ice . Ice makes the pain go away . ”[330-my mom] [[My]0-i mom]330-my mom crouches beside [me]0-i , [her]330-my mom entire body shaking as [she]330-my mom presses a cloth to [my]0-i shoulder . [Her]330-my mom face is so white . [I]0-i want to say [her]330-my mom name , but [my]0-i throat constricts as searing pain burns through [my]0-i upper body . [My]0-i eyes squeeze shut , causing tears to stream down [my]0-i face . All around [us]331-us is chaos . The kitchen table is against the wall , and a chair is broken in two . Beside [me]0-i on the floor , a splintered piece of wood lies in what looks like a growing puddle of red paint . Only , it ’s not paint , and [I]0-i ’m afraid . “ Look what [you]333-my mother made [me]332-my father do ! ”[332-my father] [[My]0-i father]332-my father yells at [us]331-us , pacing back and forth . [He]332-my father jerks [[my]0-i mother]333-my mother off of [me]0-i by [her]330-my mom hair . “ [You]333-my mother made [me]332-my father do this . ”[332-my father] Fear squeezes [my]0-i lungs so hard , [I]0-i ca n’t breathe , and lights flash in [the room]334-the room through the windows like a rainbow . [People in white]335-people in white rush into [[our]331-us house]336-our house , and [a woman with orange - blonde hair and sky - blue eyes]337-a woman with orange - blonde hair and sky - blue eyes leans over [me]0-i . [She]337-a woman with orange - blonde hair and sky - blue eyes puts [her]337-a woman with orange - blonde hair and sky - blue eyes hand on [my]0-i forehead and smiles gently while [another person in white]338-another person in white lifts [me]0-i off the floor . [She]337-a woman with orange - blonde hair and sky - blue eyes speaks softly , but [I]0-i ca n’t understand [her]337-a woman with orange - blonde hair and sky - blue eyes . Is [she]337-a woman with orange - blonde hair and sky - blue eyes [an angel]339-an angel ? Did [I]0-i die ? It ’s [my]0-i last thought before the darkness closes [my]0-i eyes …

“ This is [[your]0-i room]2070-your room now . ”[340-the old man] [The old man]340-the old man opens a door and gestures [me]0-i into [a space the size of [a small house]342-a small house]341-a space the size of a small house . [My]0-i eyes are wide as [I]0-i step carefully on the highly polished wood floor . [It]343-it ’s made of small pieces of wood arranged in a diamond pattern , and a thin rug with a large , oval - shaped design covers the floor . Driving up to [this place]344-this place , [I]0-i gazed up at the soaring white columns topped with curling leaves and scrolls . Above [them]345-them , so high [I]0-i could barely see from [the car]346-the car , the roof had a railing , like [you]347-you could walk around up there . [I]0-i ’ve never seen [a house like this]348-a house like this outside of a movie or a storybook . It ’s [a castle]349-a castle . [It]349-a castle ’s also dark and empty . “ [I]0-i hope [you]350-he find it comfortable [here]2071-here . ”[0-i] [I]0-i look up at [him]350-he , unsure what to say . [He]350-he ’s tall with lots of gray hair that swooshes around [his]350-he head like that scientist in the picture at [[my]0-i school]351-my school . [He]350-he ’s wearing a scratchy brown jacket and dark pants , and [he]350-he has a beard . [His]350-he dark eyes are intense like a bird or a reptile , watching [me]0-i . “ Are [you]350-he [a king]2072-a king ? ”[0-i] [My]0-i voice is small . “ [I]350-he ’m [[your]350-he new father]2073-your new father . [You]350-he may call [me]350-he [Drake]134-drake . ”[350-he] [His]350-he voice is low and measured , like [he]350-he carefully chooses the exact word to say before [he]350-he speaks . “ Where ’s [[my]350-he mom]330-my mom ? ”[350-he] Sadness pinches [my]0-i chest when [I]0-i remember the last time [I]0-i saw [her]352-she . [His]350-he eyes blink away , into [the hall]353-the hall . “ [She]352-she ca n’t take care of [you]0-i anymore . [You]0-i ’re going to live with [me]350-he now . ”[350-he] [I]0-i ’m not sure what [he]350-he means . “ Did [she]352-she die ? ”[350-he] “ Not as far as [I]350-he know . ”[350-he] [His]350-he tone is grave like [he]350-he does n’t want to dwell on this subject . “ If [you]0-i ’re all settled , [I]350-he ’ll leave [you]0-i to [your]0-i thoughts . ”[350-he] [I]0-i follow [him]350-he quickly into [the massive hallway covered in paintings bigger than [me]0-i]354-the massive hallway covered in paintings bigger than me . [It]354-the massive hallway covered in paintings bigger than me ’s as wide as [a dining room]355-a dining room , and long rugs cover the floors that go on for miles . [My]0-i footsteps echo off the polished wood as [I]0-i scuffle after [him]350-he . “ Are [we]2075-we the only ones here ? ”[350-he] [He]350-he pauses and turns , looking down at [me]0-i slowly as if [I]0-i ’m an insect [he]350-he ’s considering gobbling up . [I]0-i shrink back , wishing [I]0-i had n’t asked . “ Are [you]0-i afraid of being alone , [Spencer]198-spencer ? ”[0-i] [My]0-i eyes are wide , and [I]0-i want [[my]0-i mom]330-my mom . The expression on [his]350-he face tells [me]0-i that would be the wrong answer . “ No , [sir]2076-sir . ”[350-he] “ Good . Only [a weak man]2077-a weak man is bothered by being alone . Are [you]0-i weak ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i ’m not sure if [I]0-i ’m weak or if [I]0-i ’m even [a man]357-a man yet , but [I]0-i know how to survive . “ No , [sir]2076-sir . ”[0-i] [His]350-he eyes flinch almost like [he]350-he would smile if that were possible . “ Never fall for the lie that [you]0-i need [other people]2079-other people . Only when [you]0-i are completely independent are [you]0-i truly strong . ”[350-he] [He]350-he starts to go , but [I]0-i hold out [my]0-i hand . “ But … Why do [you]350-he need [me]0-i ? ”[0-i] The spark of approval evaporates like smoke . “ [I]0-i do n’t . ”[0-i] [His]350-he gaze travels up and around [the hall]353-the hall , pausing at a window twice as tall as [he]350-he is . “ When [I]350-he am gone , [I]350-he will leave [[my]350-he estate]2080-my estate to [you]0-i , then [you]0-i will be like [me]350-he . ”[350-he] Cold eyes return to [mine]0-i . “ Now get some rest . [I]350-he ’ll begin [your]0-i education tomorrow . ”[350-he] Dread filters through [my]0-i stomach , but [I]0-i do n’t dare argue . [My]0-i shoulder hurts , and [I]0-i ’m sleepy . [I]0-i do n’t know why [I]0-i ’m [here]2071-here , but [I]0-i remember [[my]0-i mom]330-my mom saying it would be okay . Returning quietly to [[my]0-i room]361-my room , [I]0-i notice a sweaty glass of ice water on [my]0-i bedside table . [My]0-i eyes close , and [I]0-i focus on the cold as it slowly melts away . Then [I]0-i do it again .

Chapter 1

[Joselyn]135-joselyn

Present day

[Her]178-daisy vintage Givenchy wedding dress swishes around [her]178-daisy knees , and [she]178-daisy ’s moving fast towards [the bathroom]367-the bathroom . “ What happened now ? ”[178-daisy] [I]0-i follow [her]178-daisy , leaning against the outside wall with a long sigh as [she]178-daisy shuts the louvered door . “ [You]0-i know what happened . ”[178-daisy] “ [Idiot Flick]138-idiot flick again ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i chew [my]0-i bottom lip . “ [He]138-idiot flick ’s not [an idiot]2082-an idiot . Now all [my]0-i stuff is at [[his]2083-he place]2087-his place . ”[0-i] “ [I]178-daisy know two guys who will be happy to help [you]0-i move . ”[178-daisy] Even in heels , [her]178-daisy head only reaches [my]0-i nose . If [I]0-i leaned forward , [I]0-i could rest [my]0-i chin on the top of [her]178-daisy head . “ This is not something to worry about on [your]178-daisy wedding day . Let ’s get back to the party . Chapter 23

Chapter 30

[Spencer]198-spencer “ [I]252-tom checked [all the rooms]3053-all the rooms , and [I]252-tom reset the alarm codes . ”[252-tom] [Tom]252-tom strides into [the living room]492-the living room with a black duffel in [his]252-tom hand . “ It ’ll prompt [you]0-i to enter a new code when [I]252-tom leave . Twist of Fate

Special Sneak Peek

A [friends - to - lovers , second - chance , stand - alone romance]1872-friends - to - lovers , second - chance , stand - alone romance by USA Today bestselling author [Tia Louise]198-spencer .

To be “ just [friends ”]3155-friends ”[2295-a guy] with [a guy]2295-a guy , [you]1868-your ’ve got to follow The Rules : Do n’t touch [him]2295-a guy unnecessarily . Do n’t share [your]1868-your intimate dreams with [him]2295-a guy ( even if [he]2295-a guy asks ) . Do n’t kiss [him]2295-a guy , and definitely do n’t sleep with [him]2295-a guy .
